stage1.name: #1 Find the Car
stage1.description: Locate the car and drive out to escape.

stage2.name: #2 Fuel Run
stage2.description: Find fuel, bring it to the car, then escape.

stage3.name: #3 Rescue Buddy
stage3.description: Find your stranded buddy, pick up fuel, and escape together.

stage4.name: #4 Evacuate Survivors
stage4.description: Load terrified civilians into the car and escape before they turn.

stage5.name: #5 Survive Until Dawn
stage5.description: No fuel—endure 20 minutes, then walk out when dawn arrives.
stage5.intro:
(No fuel inside, it seems...
Guess I'll have to survive until dawn.)

stage6.name: #6 Tracker Run
stage6.description: Escape like stage 2, but some zombies follow your trail.

stage7.name: #7 Rescue Buddy 2
stage7.description: Rescue your buddy. Wall-hugging zombies appear.

stage8.name: #8 Assembly Floor
stage8.description: Narrow corridors. Get surrounded, and there’s no escape.

stage9.name: #9 Evacuate Survivors 2
stage9.description: Evacuate like stage 4, but narrow corridors. Requires fuel.

stage10.name: #10 Outbreak
stage10.description: Zombies have infiltrated a building where survivors took shelter.

stage11.name: #11 Don't Look Back!
stage11.description: Left or right. Trust your instinct.

stage12.name: #12 OVERHEAD HAZARD
stage12.description: An open factory floor. Zombies may fall from above.

stage14.name: #14 Falling Factory
stage14.description: A factory with collapsed upper floors. Break through obstacles.

stage15.name: #15 The Divide
stage15.description: A central hazard splits the building. Cross with care.

stage16.name: #16 Floor Collapse
stage16.description: Circumnavigate the collapsed floor panels and lure the zombies into the abyss.

stage17.name: #17 Harder to Trap
stage17.description: Zombies track your trail and are harder to lure into pitfalls.

stage18.name: #18 Mold Factory
stage18.description: Don’t get cornered at the edges.

stage20.name: #20 Rescue Request
stage20.description: Link up and escape by car.
stage20.intro:
"...
The team should be inside.
Link up with them."
